      • execute

        public void execute()
             throws java.lang.Exception
        Executes the pipeline. The stage list is bound to the xml reader, then the parse method is called on the xml reader, passing in the source object. This method should only be executed once, and then the pipeline should be thrown away.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
